website_summaries.verdict: A deluxe men's snowboarding jacket that is expertly constructed and proven to perform in frigid temperatures.
pros: Pockets include hook and loop closures and straps to help you keep small items safe inside the jacket
Taffeta lining ensures you can stay warm, regardless of how much time you spend on the slopes
Polyester construction guarantees the jacket will maintain its appearance for years to come
Comes with a handy powder skirt
cons: Pricey in comparison to similar jackets

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat small, so I went up a size. Glad I did!
customer_reviews.text: For a snowboard jacket you'd expect a bit looser fit below the waist for freedom of movement. My other jackets and coats are XL with plenty of room to spare. For whatever reason, this jacket as well as most other spots gear run a size small. I also believe jackets that extend beyond the top of the buttocks should flair out a bit, instead the latest jacket seems to actually be more form fitting than order Servo jackets. Although a lot of extra room in the chest and shoulders area. You can see what I'm talking about in the stock photo. That said, it's still a great jacket and the latest version seems to be of better material.
customer_reviews.author: L.P.

customer_reviews.title: Great snow coat!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful well designed and well constructed. The pockets have Velcro as well as snaps. Napoleon pocket, lined and insulated just right. Pit zips and drawstring. Nice fabric and color. Just a little roomier than I'm used to but not overly big. Goggle pocket inside! Big zipper ring (for when your gloves are on). Pass pocket on left arm. Zipped side pockets, and snow gaiter. What else do you need? (somebody else to pay for it!)Ha!
customer_reviews.author: Todd C.

customer_reviews.title: Order 2 sizes down..just sayin!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'8 165lbs. Ordered this jacket in a small as DC's jackets run HUGE. I typically wear a large and had ordered this initially in that size. It was WAY to big..like a xxl. The small Fits perfect. Jacket has great features and looks great!!
customer_reviews.author: Brush WolfTop Contributor: Snowboarding

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, super warm, highly recomment for cold climate
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this!!! We got it for the ski slopes. He got hot. haha Protects from cold and wet extremely well. Love the thumb holes. Pockets are great with double velcrow and kept everythying safe inside even when he tumbled down the slope. Great looking jacket and great fit. My 6ft 13 year old fit his Men's medium perfectly. It also arrived fast and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for 15k Water Proof rating
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is great. I'm 5'5 and 140 lbs and ordered an extra small which is still a little bit big even for baggy snowboarding gear. The 15k water proof rating is amazing at this price point, and overall the jacket is high quality and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT JACKET!!! GET IT NOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I got it, first of all, it fits bigger for the size so order your size, if you going to have bulky under layers of clothes but if not it will be a little baggy that been said, make sure your order said BRAND NEW, even though mine was good and with all tags(where NOT attach) I think it was USED but I don't care considering $$$$ it was. I was up in the mountains at 35f cold, wind, snow and didn't feel the cold(very impress) without under-layers of clothes, just a cotton undershirt and considering am very skinny, my bones hurt when am cold but didn't feel a thing with this jacket, two thumbs up!!!! GET IT !
customer_reviews.author: RICARDO

customer_reviews.title: Fits exactly like I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: Fits exactly like I had hoped.... I normally wear a large as far as t shirts go, XL hoodies, etc (I have a long, slim torso and long arms), and I purchased this in a medium. PERFECT! Most of my dress shirts are 35, slim, with a 16.5 neck. Hope this helps. I'll try and post a picture soon. Absolutely love the quality of this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Erickson

customer_reviews.title: I like the color, but I'm not impressed with the functionality.
customer_reviews.text: Okay as an inexpensive beginner jacket. On the whole I'm not super happy with it. The pockets seem oddly placed and not as convenient to work with as I'd like. The size runs a little larger than I'd like. Next time I buy a boarding jacket I'll spend a little more to get a nicer one.
customer_reviews.author: JetstormNation

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket for price
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect! 6ft 195lbs I purchased a medium based on reviews instead of the large. Fits great while wearing shirt and hoodie. Closeable armpit vents! Easy access smartphone pocket. Non removable powder skirt that has sturdy button clips. Super satisfied
customer_reviews.author: richie roll

customer_reviews.title: Tested and approved over a weekend of snow packed fun. Wrist-gators where fantastic though I wish it had ...
customer_reviews.text: Tested and approved over a weekend of snow packed fun. Wrist-gators where fantastic though I wish it had more ventilation on the sleeve side of the jacket, overall I stayed warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie D.

customer_reviews.title: Fit great, was warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, was warm and comfortable. The snow skirt snaps into DC snow pants which is nice to stay dry. Lots of storage also. I recommend washing it a few times when you first get it. Mine smelled like fishing bait, but that went away after the second wash.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few DC snowboard jackets. I bought this one for the 2019 season in Breck., Co. It kept me very warm and has tons of pockets and fit great. I got a few compliments on the jacket so for me its a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Scotto

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket, quick delivery!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the overall fit and design of this jacket. There are a sensible number of useful pockets and storage options. I got this to have on hand for my free ski days when I am not in my ski school uniform. It's proven to be just the thing for a quick change into "civies" that still provides many of the features I enjoy in my pro jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket and great fit! Great job DC!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is awesome!!! I went to Taos, New Mexico the weather was normal bright blue sky days. So it kept me warm and snug. The jackets upper pockets were a valuable asset, especially when filming as much as I did. I have so many gadgets for my GoPro equipment and my iPhone 6 plus. The hood was large enough to go over my helmet if needed. That is a big plus. The quality of the jacket is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Hollenbeck

customer_reviews.title: I love this military style jacket.  Tons of pockets!
customer_reviews.text: I use this last year on the hill and it performed well. Warm enough and certainly waterproof. Very nice features. A little worried about the durability because the product is showing signs of wear after minimal usage but snowboarding can be a brutal full contact sport. I got it on sale so it was really a super value.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Scott Custer

customer_reviews.title: We returned it because there was no way it would be comfortable to snowboard in
customer_reviews.text: Very rigid fabric and too long for my husband. We returned it because there was no way it would be comfortable to snowboard in.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket with lots of features
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket with lots of features, but slightly larger than I'd like. I usually wear a medium and even in the small size this jacket is slightly too large. Other than that, great jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Roq

customer_reviews.title: which is the perfect length for outerwear in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: I have a fairly skinny athletic frame (6ft 170lbs) and the size large had a baggy fit on me. Sleeves come down around my knuckles and the jacket just covers my butt, which is the perfect length for outerwear in my opinion, but it definitely has a boxy cut. If your on the skinny side and want a tailored fit this isn't the jacket for you.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Hilger

customer_reviews.title: Da bomb!
customer_reviews.text: Everything i want from a snowboard jacket: Rugged shell, insulation, waterproofing, taped seams, zip-vents, hood, snow-skirt, ski-pass sleeve pocket, goggle-pocket, iPod pocket with earphone hole, more pockets...
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Runs small but warm
customer_reviews.text: Jacket does run roughly 1 size too large. A medium fit me perfectly me being 5'10'' 180lbs. Jacket is a pretty warm shell and is great down to low temps when layering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Totally legit jacket. High quality at a great price. I researched a lot of jackets from a lot of different manufacturers and this one rates right up there at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Young Prime

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket, but size down
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this jacket is great, save for the size running too large. All the pockets are appropriate and functional, the weight is mid range, not super bulky but not too light. Style is more intricate than picture lead on. To reiterate others size down a full size. I just wish there were more size small available. I returned the size medium. I'm 5' 9" 170 and medium is too large/long.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Met all expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This is going to be a perfect jacket for my son's snowboarding. The fit, the features, the style, the material - all are exactly what he was looking for. I would say that the description "wool workmans stripe" may mislead someone to initially think this item is wool.
customer_reviews.author: D. Glazner

customer_reviews.title: Great size, so comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: An AMAZING jacket. I ordered it from Argentina, sold by the Smooth Shop. Here un Argentina, usually I found XL's clothes often too small. I'm 1,87mts, 89kg. But I had the feeling that this jacket (L) would fit me well. So, i'm glad surprise for the size. I can use a hoodie below it. Incredible jacket by DC.
customer_reviews.author: German Robert

customer_reviews.title: Just can't go wrong with dc, I usually wear ...
customer_reviews.text: Just can't go wrong with dc, I usually wear large, but I read the comments and the medium fits me very well. Very waterproof, stay dry on the slopes all day
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: I wear large but medium in this jacket fits perfect, not tight whatsoever
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews and took their advice and got a size down. I wear large but medium in this jacket fits perfect, not tight whatsoever. Awesome jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Decay

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket for snowboard
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket for snowboard. I used it last season and it fit well and kept me warm. No complaints. Great overall.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: It was just what I was looking for. The sizes run big, I am 6' and 195 lbs and the large fit just perfect. I usually wear an XL in my other jackets that I have.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Berish

customer_reviews.title: everything else is wonderful, the waterproof is real
customer_reviews.text: Although it comes in a little too large, everything else is wonderful, the waterproof is real!
customer_reviews.author: cksp

customer_reviews.title: a little big but that's okay - ordered a men's jacket because I didn't like any of the styles for women
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected, a little big but that's okay - ordered a men's jacket because I didn't like any of the styles for women. great jacket overall, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits nice, the inner sleeves glove snow block hurts the thumbs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit isn't perfect but not bad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a worn coat I had. I bought XL, and it fits, but is a tight fit for XL. I think XXL would be way too big, so maybe I just need to loose a few LB's haha. I love the pockets, and are in the right places in my opinion...especially the one on the left arm. The phone/mp3 pocket zipper sometimes is right in the same place where I zip down the coat at times, so I'll zip it down and it stops...so I think the zipper is stuck. Tough to explain that I guess..but it's only when wearing gloves. Anyway, happy with this, and the workmans stripe color is pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: J. W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket, fit my son who is 16yrs. old great! Fast delivery and lots of compliments on it. thanks
customer_reviews.author: honest k

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket, love it
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket, love it. Wear as a casual everyday jacket and on the slopes but need a mid layer. Also if your a medium and order a medium this jacket will be huge! Order size down. I'm 5'9" 170lb, small fits me perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Very warm. Pockets are plentiful. Lots of features. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Mundokiir

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing jacket for an amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: Jacket is everything i ask for in a snow jacket. Durability Stylish Tons of pockets Earphone placements And cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Chris F.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I probably could have gotten a medium. The reviews to get one size smaller wasn't a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Birch

customer_reviews.title: Fitting.
customer_reviews.text: Best jacket I have can't wait to go to Breckenbridge in 4 days. I've bin wearing it for 1 month now and the fit is perfect. I'm pretty well built 5'6 172LB and the medium fits perfect around the waist back and arms ! Very hard for me to find something that fits like this. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: rolan

customer_reviews.title: It is a good jacket with plenty of pockets
customer_reviews.text: It is a good jacket with plenty of pockets. It's not too warm but you can layer this with another jacket. Runs one size large.
customer_reviews.author: Saugat

customer_reviews.title: The jacket is awesome. It's well designed and warm
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is awesome. It's well designed and warm. My only issue is that I listened to the other reviews for the size I am typically a lg/xl so I went with a lg fits good but I should of went with an XL. 5'8", 195 lbs
customer_reviews.author: Talia DeLisle

customer_reviews.title: Love the jacket but it's a bit too large
customer_reviews.text: Love the jacket but it's a bit too large. Is it possible to return the Large for a Men's Medium? Everything else good! Delivery was a little challenging but we got it eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excelent product and seller
customer_reviews.text: Excelent product and seller.... very good quality and good price. Fits well, but its not a slim fitted jacket. Im 6, and 154.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This jacket did the trick for this season in Colorado ...
customer_reviews.text: This jacket did the trick for this season in Colorado. Purchased M and it fits right. I'm 6' 185 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Stockard

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my boyfriend and he loved it! Used it while snowboarding and had no ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend and he loved it! Used it while snowboarding and had no complaints. So many pockets! Fits perfectly and for half the price as in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket. Good deal for the price. Looks and feel awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It fit as expected is very comfortable, arrived on time and in like it very much, exactly as it is show in the website
customer_reviews.author: mauricio pino yancovic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good protection from cold windy weather, while same time don't overheat during the sport.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and the color is elegant and better than expected
customer_reviews.text: 6" and 155 pounds fits it very much, and the color is elegant and better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: LIU, HUI HSUAN

customer_reviews.title: It's great!
customer_reviews.text: It's great!!! Brought it skiing twice, keeps me warm and dry! Lots of pockets and I like the headphone hole. Pretty sweet!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Wagner

customer_reviews.title: but still an awesome jacket. Very warm and soft inside
customer_reviews.text: Large, but still an awesome jacket. Very warm and soft inside. I recomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks cool. It keeps warm very well. The size is a little big.
customer_reviews.author: Luming H.

customer_reviews.title: waterproof, shell, loose fit
customer_reviews.text: The servo jacket is well made and holds up in the snow and with 15k is pretty waterproof. It is not the warmest jacket which was something I was looking for because I tend to overheat on the mountain. The pit vents allowed for nice airflow and the wrist cuffs kept the snow out. The best aspect of the jacket to me was the media pocket which had nice cable management. Overall fit was on the loose/baggy side meaning it is not a street wear type jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks amazing and fits amazing
customer_reviews.text: It looks amazing and fits amazing! The pockets are super useful. So many to be had. haha. Everything is great about this product. Can't wait to try it out next month in Colorado!
customer_reviews.author: Lenin Glass

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket
customer_reviews.text: The color is great the Medium is a little too big for son who is 14 years old and 5'10" but, it doesn't look as large as the other jacket I purchased for my other son.
customer_reviews.author: CHOPSTIX

customer_reviews.title: This jacket is AMAZING!! My poser outfit is now complete
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is AMAZING!! My poser outfit is now complete. I never hit the slopes once in my life but now have the confidence in my DC Snowboarding Jacket to go to a resort and pay for a lift ticket, not to shred fresh pow or anything but to have the lift ticket attached to a zipper for YEARS to truly look like a double black Ripper. Jib the jab and shred the gnar dudes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's even better looking in person
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my husband. 2XL fits perfectly. It's even better looking in person. Tons of pockets.
customer_reviews.author: slscan

customer_reviews.title: i originally bought a medium because that is the size ...
customer_reviews.text: i originally bought a medium because that is the size i typically wear in most jackets and shirts. the medium was HUGE! this jacket fit me well though.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Stuttle

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome all around jacket. I love wearing it for the snow and on those really cold days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my son. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the wrist cuffs with the thumb holes are too tight!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

product_meta.title: DC Men's Servo 15k Water Proof Snowboard Jacket
